name: Sweet Seduction
description:
Best played in Full Screen!

"There has been an ancient prophecy told in our Candy Kingdom…"

"An outworlder will one day bless our land with their magnificent power and will rule over us all in benevolent sovereignty…"

"And our new ruler would get to choose who would be their new partner-- regardless of status."

In Sweet Seduction you play as one of four candy characters attempting to seduce the new other-worldly ruler of Candy Kingdom. 

Play as Peppermint, Chocolate, Sour Lemon, or Bubblegum and compete against your friends in order to get the most heart points and win this candy-themed board game. 

Roll a dice and move throughout the board, each type of space having a different effect that could either help or hinder you through the game. 

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 game jam in 48 hours! It's local multiplayer only because networking hurts my brain, but it's still fun to play with a group of four friends, even in a discord call!

Credits

Story: Sonic12o3 and ArtsyTheSecond

Art: ArtsyTheSecond

Music: ArtsyTheSecond

Programming: Sonic12o3 (that's me!)
